Issue.creator: tongliofcary
Issue.summary: Need a new document to run ansible agent when a set of machines are already available
Issue.description: Currently ansible agent can setup fabric network on cloud and on a set of physical machines, however the instruction on how to setup fabric network on an existing set of either physical machines or VMs is not clear. We need to either update an existing document to improve the instructions or we need to create a brad new document to let people easily use their own machines (already provisioned vs provision by the agent) to setup fabric network.
